identity.name: E1_DMS_System
principles: Content is King: The document is the hero.
Fusion: Swiss Typography meets Digital Utility.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to indicate hierarchy, not lines.
Micro-Interactions: Every click has a subtle reaction.

rules: Labels must be uppercase and small with wide tracking.

dashboard_structure.sidebar: w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col border-r bg-white h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 z-30

buttons.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

cards.style: rounded-lg border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm transition-all duration-200 hover:shadow-md

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

login_background.usage: Right side of split-screen login page. Object-cover.

empty_state.usage: Background for empty states or 404 pages.

rules: All interactive elements must have :focus-visible states.
Use semantic HTML (main, nav, aside, section).
All images must have alt text.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle noise.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Avoid 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans'.
All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react sonner clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-separator @radix-ui/react-tabs @radix-ui/react-avatar @radix-ui/react-tooltip`
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure Tailwind theme in `tailwind.config.js` to match the color palette.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the layout components (Sidebar, Header, MainLayout).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Implement the Login page with the split-screen design.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build the Dashboard with the Bento Grid layout.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Implement the Document List with the custom Table component.
